column3: FRENCH

column2: 'So, wait, are they playing American football or soccer?'\n'Yes.'
A lover of beauty, this individual is both a patron and a practitioner of all forms of the arts, ranging from painting, holograms and movies to fanfiction and song.
There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance.

column3: Curieux

column2: This character is curious and inquisitive, willing to try anything once and always in search of new ideas.
column3: Ce personnage est curieux et indiscret, prêt à tout essayer et toujours à la recherche de nouvelles idées.
Prudent

column2: This character is cautious, reserved, and afraid of unfamiliar experiences.
column3: Ce personnage est prudent, réservé, et s'effraie des expériences inhabituelles.
Discipliné

column2: This character is a methodical, rigorous, and dutiful in everything they do.
column3: Ce personnage est méthodique, rigoureux et consciencieu dans tout ce qu'il entreprend.
Insouciant

column2: This character always seems calm and relaxed - possibly to the point of neglect.
column3: Ce personnage semble toujours calme et détendu - parfois jusqu'à la négligence.
Sociable

column2: This character is a social butterfly who loves to make friends and meet new people.
column3: Ce personnage est un "papillon" social qui aime se faire des amis et rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.
Solitaire

column2: This character prefers privacy to social gatherings, and is always nervous in large crowds.
column3: Ce personnage préfère l'intimité aux rassemblements, et est toujours nerveux au sein de la foule.This character prefers privacy to social gatherings, and is always nervous in large crowds.
Amical

column2: This character is warm, compassionate, and agreeable, always happy to lend a helping hand.
column3: Ce personnage est chaleureux, compatissant, et agréable, toujours heureux de tendre une main secourable.
Froid

column2: This character has little time for the petty concerns of others.
column3: Ce personnage accorde peu de temps aux petits soucis des autres.
Névrosé

column2: This character is highly insecure and emotionally volatile, potentially willing to lash out at anybody close to hand.
column3: Ce personnage est hautement autodestructeur et émotionellement instable, potentiellement prêt à s'en prendre à n'importe qui.
Confiant

column2: This character has great self-confidence that seems to manifest in everything they do.
column3: Ce personnage possède une grande confiance en lui qui semble se manifester dans tout ce qu'il entreprend.
Mystique

column2: This character believes strongly that there is a power greater than that which can be perceived by mortal eyes.
column3: Ce personnage est fortement persuadé qu'il existe une puissance supérieure à celles perceptibles par les yeux des mortels.
Sceptique

column2: This character is a realist who believes only in that which the evidence can justify.
column3: Ce personnage est un réaliste qui ne crois que ce que des preuves peuvent étayer.
Radical

column2: This character is strongly committed to their ideological beliefs, and willing to go to great lengths for their cause.
column3: Ce personnage est fortement engagé envers sa croyance idéologique, et prêt à aller très loin pour la cause.
Pragmatique

column2: This character sees any ideological or moral concerns as irrelevant next to their own self-interest.
column3: Ce personnage perçoit les préocupations idéologiques et morales comme des obstacles à son propre intérêt.
Clône

column2: This character is a clone, an artificially-created human based on someone else's genetic stock.
column3: Ce personnage est un clône, un être humain créé artificiellement à partir du modèle génétique de quelqu'un d'autre.
Séduisant

column2: This character is considered to be stunningly beautiful by the standards of their culture.
column3: Ce personnage est réputé posséder une beautée éblouissante selon les standards de sa culture.
Repoussant

column2: While not particularly ugly, this character is still considered relatively unattractive by the standards of their culture.
column3: Bien que pas particulièrement laid, ce personange est néanmoins considéré comme relativement disgracieux selon les standards de sa culture.
Agile

column2: This character is unusually dexterous and light on their feet.
column3: Ce personnage est exceptionnellement dextre et leste.
Tall
Ce personnage est exceptionnellement dextre et leste.
Maladroit

column2: This character always seems to manage to press exactly the wrong button or trip over their own feet.
column3: Ce personnage semble toujours devoir presser le mauvais bouton au mauvais moment, ou se prendre les pieds dans le tapis.
Pilote de chasseur

column2: This character's military training focused on small, single-pilot ships such as fighters and bombers.
column3: Ce personnage a reçu une éducation militaire focalisée sur le pilote de petite unités comme les chasseurs ou les bombardiers légers.
Capitaine de vaisseau

column2: This character's military training focused on mass fleet actions involving capital ships such as destroyers, battlecruisers, and dreadnoughts.
column3: Ce personnage à reçu une éducation militaire focalisée sur les opération de flottes massives impliquant l'usage de navires capitaux comme les destroyers, croiseurs de bataille et cuirassés.
Colonel des marines

column2: This character's military training focused on infantry, armor, and artillery combat, including both planetary warfare and boarding actions.
column3: Ce personnage à reçu une éducation militaire focalisée sur l'infanterie, le blindage et l'artillerie de combat, incluant des opérations au sol et d'abordage spatial.

column2: This character's clone line has been tainted by genetic defects. Something about them is not quite right.
This character is sexually attracted to people of both sexes.
This character is sexually attracted to people of the opposite sex.
This character gave the order that resulted in the destruction of Earth's biosphere and the deaths of countless billions. This act will never be forgotten, nor forgiven.
This character's ancestor gave the order that resulted in the destruction of Earth's biosphere and the deaths of countless billions. This act will never be forgotten, nor forgiven.

This character suffers from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, causing them to deliberately avoid certain unpleasant reminders in day to day life, and to experience intense anxiety and flashbacks when they encounter those reminders.
Not everyone has innate talent at technical skills and this individual is one of the unfortunates for whom the training didn't stick.
A willingness to put in the necessary effort means this individual is conversant with the basics of engineering and the requisite sciences.

Skill at modern engineering doesn't come easily- it requires a depth of scientific thinking and background knowledge that is relatively hard to master. Fortunately this individual's dedication paid off and whether building a spacecraft, planning out the infrastructure of a city or measuring the fundamental principles behind something they rise to the occasion.

Mastering engineering and science is a difficult task, but true understanding makes one capable of looking at complex systems, visualize each subsystem (mechanical stress, heat, electrical, ergonomic, construction cost, etc), possible alternative setups and ways to determine which would be the best option.

This character has developed an addiction to Spice, a rare narcotic producible only in zero gravity. While Spice is known to greatly improve focus, memory, and even general intelligence, it is highly addictive, and its long term side effects can devastate the human nervous system. As such, it is outlawed on all civilized worlds
This character used to be addicted to Spice, but has successfully undergone rehabilitation and broken the addiction.
This character is experiencing the demoralizing effects of an economic depression
This character couldn't handle the economic aftermath of the Crisis
An economic depression is devastating the economy in this sector.
This character is suffering from cosmic radiation
This character died of cosmic radiation poisoning
An unusual amount of gamma radiation is emitting from a Superluminous Hypernova.
This character was either genetically modified or inherited this gene from a genetically modified individual.
This character was decanted in a VAT chamber, an artificially-created human grown in a test tube. The process is similar to cloning but with multiple donors.
column3: Ce personnage est un clône, un être humain créé artificiellement à partir du modèle génétique de quelqu'un d'autre.

column2: This character, or an ancestor, was born on a high gravity world. They are physically much stronger than Martians.

This character's physiology has been changed from multiple generations spent in low gravity. They are much taller and thinner on average than other humans and cannot survive on a high gravity planet for very long without special acclimating drugs.
This person is of an organized crime syndicate originating from back before space travel.

This character, or an ancestor, was genetically modified to posses a biological WiFi connection, a useful ability for staying connected and accessing information from the outernet without the need for gadgets or cybernetics. Essentially, they can communicate telepathically with other BiFi.
This character, or an ancestor, had their genes spliced with a cat. Though still recognizably human, the results are uncanny.
This character currently feels like things are going well and their life is under their control.
This character is currently taking a leave of absence from their official duties.
All good things must pass. Lately you've found your good humor slipping. The universe once again feels like a vast, unknowable, and hostile place, where your well-being is a temporary accident.
Ah. Things are back to normal, then.
